head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NEWMAN, EVELYN BONHART CHARWAT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NEWMAN, EVELYN BONHART CHARWAT

block.p: NEWMAN-Evelyn Bonhart Charwat. Age 97, died on May 11. Daughter of Fannie and Peter Bonhart. Widow of William Charwat and Abraham Newman. Sister of Celia Greenfield and Doris Klein. Mother of Florence Charwat Simon and Arthur and Marilyn Charwat. Grandmother of Wendy and Mark Zlotlow, Michael and Shari Simon, Barbara Simon and Skipp Porteous, and William and Lauren Charwat. Great-grandmother of eight. Contributions may be made to Brandeis University National Women's Committee or a charity of choice.
